clip.quote: I challenged REALTORS to set a schedule to become their buyers' pro bono real estate financial advisor every year.
clip.why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to redefine their role and create lasting client relationships.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to be more than just a REALTOR? Here's how to become your clients' trusted advisor.
